Specimen Type: Whole blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: To generate accurate, consistent, and reproducible genetic analysis results for the diagnosis of cystinuria.
Container: EDTA blood tube, saliva collection kit, or sterile buccal swab container
Equipment: Thermocycler for PCR, Next-Generation Sequencing platform, Agilent 2200 TapeStation, DNA Extraction Kit, Library Preparation Kit
